note.p: Surgeon. Of Bradford upon Avon, Wiltshire; retired to Bath, Somerset. Father of Joseph Chaning Pearce.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1942/686/16)
England & Wales, Prerogative Court of Canterbury wills, 1384–1858 (Ancestry.com, accessed 24 February 2016)
